name: Super Disc Soccer
summary: Super Disc Soccer is a turn based soccer like game that can be played as a single player or 2-Players. Players can select and drag on their units to adjust the power and direction of the shoot. Select between different defensive and offensive formations to adjust your tactics and strategy during play. The game also features "Tournament" and "Penalty Kicks" modes. Features : - Arcade and Tournament Mode - One or Two player mode - Simple, but highly addictive physics based game-play - Realistic soccer ball physics for a thrilling and rational game-play
